title: Mock Draft Monday: Coronavirus Concerns, Tua Tagovailoa Scenarios (Football 3/16)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by draft experts Ryan Wilson and R.J. White for another edition of 'Mock Draft Monday'. The guys first discuss how COVID-19 could affect the NFL Draft (1:50), both leading up to the event and the actual event itself, which is still planned to take place in Las Vegas in late April. Will, Ryan and R.J. then dive into Ryan's latest mock and focus on all the possible scenarios for Tua Tagovailoa (31:30).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @RyanWilson, @rjwhite1
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
